'''Primal Constructs''' are an [[Elite Enemy|elite]] enemy group. As leftover technology of the [[Scarlet King]]'s civilization, they are found across the [[Great Red Sand]].

In combat, perform [[Physical]] attacks, and may enter an invisible state after deploying parts on the battlefield. While a Primal Construct is in this state, the player can destroy its deployed parts, forcing it to repair them. If an {{Electro}} attack hits a part while it is being repaired, the Primal Construct will become paralyzed.

Like [[Ruin Machine]]s, some Primal Constructs may be dormant instead of patrolling a set route. Using [[Elemental Sight]] helps distinguish dormant constructs from those serving as scenery.
